forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Partly to mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Mostly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers after midnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.
